unnormalised: Guys, don't forget to link your PAN card (e.g., ABCDE1234F) with Aadhaar before 31/03/2024, warna your ITR filing will get delayed. And for GST related stuff, make sure your GSTIN (like 27AAAAA1234B1Z7) is correctly mentioned on all invoices. Also, check your TAN (e.g., DELA12345A) is updated with the latest details. Tax season is a headache, yaar!
normalised: Guys, don't forget to link your P-A-N card (for example, A-B-C-D-E one two three four F) with Aadhaar before thirty first march two thousand and twenty four, warna your I-T-R filing will get delayed. And for G-S-T related stuff, make sure your G-S-T-I-N (like twenty seven A-A-A-A-A one two three four B one Z seven) is correctly mentioned on all invoices. Also, check your T-A-N (for example, D-E-L-A one two three four five A) is updated with the latest details. Tax season is a headache, yaar!
